recipe.recipe_name: Mixed Nuts and Seeds Trail Mix
recipe.ingredients: - raw almonds: 1/2 cup - walnut halves: 1/2 cup - pumpkin seeds: 1/4 cup - sunflower seeds: 1/4 cup - dried cranberries (unsweetened): 1/4 cup - dark chocolate chips (optional): 1/4 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Combine Ingredients: In a large bowl, mix together almonds, walnut halves, pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds, dried cranberries, and if using, dark chocolate chips. 2. Portion and Store: Divide the trail mix into individual serving bags or containers. This helps in controlling portion size and makes it easy to grab-and-go. 3. Enjoy: Keep a stash in your car, work desk, or bag to have a healthy snack readily available wherever you are.
